name: 高考工厂模拟(Crazy School Simulator)
description: The Crazy School Simulator is a simulation game based on the operation of a Chinese senior high school. The player will play the school Principal to build the best school in the province, and enable all students to enter into their ideal universities.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: windows 7 Processor: i3-5005U Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 4000 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
